    "lastName": "Shahzad",
    "dateOfBirth": "2024/06/03",
    "gender": "Male",
    "country": "Pakistan",
    "city": "Karachi",
    "jobTitle": "3d Animator | Motion Graphics Artist | JavaScript Developer | ReactJS | Mern Stack",
    "description": "Experienced Motion Graphic Artist and a Passionate Developer with a demonstrated history of working in various renowned t.v channels of Pakistan. I have 15 years of working experience in 2D and 3D animation using the current industry standard tools. And have been working as a Mern Stack Developer since past 1 year, I love to learn new stuff, and i like working with creative professionals. Specialties: Having Command on: * Html * Css (with different Frameworks) * JavaScript * ReactJS * ReactNative * NodeJS (ExpressJS) * MongoDB * 3d Studio Max * Adobe After Effects * Adobe Illustrator * Adobe Photoshop"
}
